ref: 5793 tārá ʻ carrying across ʼ VS., n. ʻ descent to a river ʼ AV. &rcirclemacr K. tār m. ʻ crossing a river, ferry fee ʼ; L. tār ʻ beyond one's depth (of water) ʼ; Ku. tār ʻ ford over a river ʼ; G. tār m. ʻ bank of a river, opposite bank, end ʼ; M. tārā m. ʻ ford, fordableness ʼ; Si. tara ʻ crossing over, road ʼ; <-> N. tiro -- tāro ʻ payment ʼ; -- S. *tāru → Brah. tār ʻ swimming ʼ NTS v 339.
